library.description:
Python build script for HTML 5 sites.

Compiles and minifies JS from script tags
Generates CSS from LESS files
Cleans and compiles CSS
Lossless image optimization of jpgs, pngs, gifs
library.name: Build-o-Matic

library.description: Landslide generates a slideshow using the slides that power the html5-slides presentation. Requires Python  with jinja2 and pygments modules for code blocks syntax coloration.
library.name: Landslide
